summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SimplyComply employee compliance features. Backend APIs (29/29) working perfectly including all employee management endpoints. Frontend authentication issues identified that prevent full employee workflow testing.

minor_issues.issue: Returns status 200 instead of 201 for POST requests
minor_issues.impact: Minor - functionality works correctly, just wrong status code

ui_bugs.issue: Authentication failing with test credentials (test2@example.com / TestPass123)

integration_issues.issue: Login form submits but returns 401 error, preventing access to employee features

passed_tests: Landing page loads with sectors section correctly
Signup form navigation works (Get Started button)
Dashboard page loads (even without auth - potential security issue)
Employees page loads and displays correctly
All 29 backend API endpoints working perfectly
Employee requirements auto-generation (8 requirements for veterinary sector)

success_percentage.frontend: 60% (navigation works, but authentication blocking full testing)
success_percentage.integration: 70% (API integration works, but frontend auth issues)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend authentication issue - login form returns 401 error with test credentials. Verify user creation process and ensure test2@example.com / TestPass123 credentials work or provide working test credentials. Also investigate why dashboard/employees pages load without authentication (potential security issue).
